Hak-kâ-ngî Wikipedia
Chhè-kâ me cho-tet Phiên-siá
liá-chak ngî-ngièn ke chhṳ-yù Pak-khô-chhiòn-sû.
Hak-kâ-ngî ke pán-pún kîm-ha ki-kîn yû 10,380 -phiên vùn-chông e.
齊家乜做得編寫邇隻語言嘅自由百科全書。
客家語嘅版本今下既經有10,380 篇文章吔。

Sṳ̍t-yung ke chhòng ya̍p-mien

Sîn-pet-sṳ he Thòi-vân pet-phu ke yit-ke sṳ, chhai Thòi-vân tó-song chui pet-tôn, he ngìn-khiéu chui-tô ke hàng-chṳn-khî, fàn-tîn Thòi-pet-sṳ, tûng-pet lìn-sa he Kî-lùng-sṳ, tûng-nàm chiap-sông Ngì-làn-yen, sî-nàm lìn Thò-yèn-yen. Muk-chhièn ngìn-su chhêu-ko 350-van. Pún-sṳ fàn-lau Thòi-pet-sṳ si-chû khi̍p Kî-lùng-sṳ sâm-mien, sâm-chá khiung-thùng hìn-sàng Thòi-pet tû-fi khî, su̍k-yî khiung-thùng sên-fa̍t khiên-é, pin yáng-hióng to lìm-khiun ke Thò-yèn-yen khi̍p Ngì-làn-yen. Pún-yen su̍k-yî ngie̍t-tai kui-fûng hi-heu khî, chhiòn-ngièn yí-liòng tô yì phìn-kiûn, ngie̍t phìn-kiûn chui-tâi vûn he yit-ngie̍t fun ke ngiap-sṳ 12.4 thu, ngie̍t phìn-kiûn chui-kô vûn he chhit-ngie̍t fun ke ngiap-sṳ 33.6 thu.

爾做得將滑鼠移動到文字个面頂來顯示其个對應漢字內容。
實用个長頁面

貓熊一般分安到熊貓、大熊貓或者大貓熊，係一種野生嘅哺乳動物。其撈熊同貓仔一樣都係食肉目嘅。雖然講科學家當多將其分至熊科下背去，猶有人試著其毋係熊嘅一種。貓熊嘅身體肥固固，頭圓滾滾仔，尾當短，身體面頂烏撈白兩種顏色分當清楚，身體同尾係白色，耳、目睭、手腳撈肩頭都係烏色嘅，肚底有嘅係棕色，有嘅係烏色。貓熊嘅身體一般有120至180公分該樣長，尾差毋多有10至20公分恁長，膴身大體有60至150公斤恁重。一般來講雄性嘅比雌性嘅大頭一滴仔。貓熊原旦係生活在暗摸摸仔嘅竹林裏肚，故所目睭毋好使，毋過其在暗晡嘅時節一樣遽板。

‹ ›

Khái-su̍t

Yá-têu mióng-ya̍p he Hak-kâ-ngî ke Wikipedia. Yi fôn-ngiàng kông-lìm lòi khiung-ha siá Hak-Ngî. Yû mun-thì hàn-he kien-ngi? Lòi-hi Hak-ngî Sṳ-tién, Hak-kâ-fa Fat-yîm Sṳ-tién, Thòi-vân Hak-ngî Chhṳ̀-lùi Chṳ̂-liau-khù lâu Thòi-vân Kau-yuk-pu Hak-kâ-ngî Sòng-yung-chhṳ̀ Chhṳ̀-tién chhâm-kháu!

  • Na-he ngì m̀-hiáu-tet wiki ngî-fap, kien-ngi siên hi sâ-phàn kâi-vi yù-liau yit-hâ.
  • 係唔會讀寫客語白話字請看者片！

Mò Pha̍k-fa-sṳ ke sû-ngi̍p-fap? Mò-kôan-he, cho-tet hi FHL Hakka IME miên-fi hâ-chai!
Na-yû yi-kien chhiáng email: fhl_ime@googlegroups.com .

Sṳ̍t-yung ke chhòng ya̍p-mien

Sîn-pet-sṳ he Thòi-vân pet-phu ke yit-ke sṳ, chhai Thòi-vân tó-song chui pet-tôn, he ngìn-khiéu chui-tô ke hàng-chṳn-khî, fàn-tîn Thòi-pet-sṳ, tûng-pet lìn-sa he Kî-lùng-sṳ, tûng-nàm chiap-sông Ngì-làn-yen, sî-nàm lìn Thò-yèn-yen. Muk-chhièn ngìn-su chhêu-ko 350-van. Pún-sṳ fàn-lau Thòi-pet-sṳ si-chû khi̍p Kî-lùng-sṳ sâm-mien, sâm-chá khiung-thùng hìn-sàng Thòi-pet tû-fi khî, su̍k-yî khiung-thùng sên-fa̍t khiên-é, pin yáng-hióng to lìm-khiun ke Thò-yèn-yen khi̍p Ngì-làn-yen. Pún-yen su̍k-yî ngie̍t-tai kui-fûng hi-heu khî, chhiòn-ngièn yí-liòng tô yì phìn-kiûn, ngie̍t phìn-kiûn chui-tâi vûn he yit-ngie̍t fun ke ngiap-sṳ 12.4 thu, ngie̍t phìn-kiûn chui-kô vûn he chhit-ngie̍t fun ke ngiap-sṳ 33.6 thu.

爾做得將滑鼠移動到文字个面頂來顯示其个對應漢字內容。
實用个長頁面

貓熊一般分安到熊貓、大熊貓或者大貓熊，係一種野生嘅哺乳動物。其撈熊同貓仔一樣都係食肉目嘅。雖然講科學家當多將其分至熊科下背去，猶有人試著其毋係熊嘅一種。貓熊嘅身體肥固固，頭圓滾滾仔，尾當短，身體面頂烏撈白兩種顏色分當清楚，身體同尾係白色，耳、目睭、手腳撈肩頭都係烏色嘅，肚底有嘅係棕色，有嘅係烏色。貓熊嘅身體一般有120至180公分該樣長，尾差毋多有10至20公分恁長，膴身大體有60至150公斤恁重。一般來講雄性嘅比雌性嘅大頭一滴仔。貓熊原旦係生活在暗摸摸仔嘅竹林裏肚，故所目睭毋好使，毋過其在暗晡嘅時節一樣遽板。

Khái-su̍t

Yá-têu mióng-ya̍p he Hak-kâ-ngî ke Wikipedia. Yi fôn-ngiàng kông-lìm lòi khiung-ha siá Hak-Ngî. Yû mun-thì hàn-he kien-ngi? Lòi-hi Hak-ngî Sṳ-tién, Hak-kâ-fa Fat-yîm Sṳ-tién, Thòi-vân Hak-ngî Chhṳ̀-lùi Chṳ̂-liau-khù lâu Thòi-vân Kau-yuk-pu Hak-kâ-ngî Sòng-yung-chhṳ̀ Chhṳ̀-tién chhâm-kháu!

  • Na-he ngì m̀-hiáu-tet wiki ngî-fap, kien-ngi siên hi sâ-phàn kâi-vi yù-liau yit-hâ.
  • 係唔會讀寫客語白話字請看者片！

images.desc: Sîn-pet-sṳ he Thòi-vân pet-phu ke yit-ke sṳ, chhai Thòi-vân tó-song chui pet-tôn, he ngìn-khiéu chui-tô ke hàng-chṳn-khî, fàn-tîn Thòi-pet-sṳ, tûng-pet lìn-sa he Kî-lùng-sṳ, tûng-nàm chiap-sông Ngì-làn-yen, sî-nàm lìn Thò-yèn-yen. Muk-chhièn ngìn-su chhêu-ko 350-van. Pún-sṳ fàn-lau Thòi-pet-sṳ si-chû khi̍p Kî-lùng-sṳ sâm-mien, sâm-chá khiung-thùng hìn-sàng Thòi-pet tû-fi khî, su̍k-yî khiung-thùng sên-fa̍t khiên-é, pin yáng-hióng to lìm-khiun ke Thò-yèn-yen khi̍p Ngì-làn-yen. Pún-yen su̍k-yî ngie̍t-tai kui-fûng hi-heu khî,  chhiòn-ngièn yí-liòng tô yì phìn-kiûn, ngie̍t phìn-kiûn chui-tâi vûn he yit-ngie̍t fun ke ngiap-sṳ 12.4 thu, ngie̍t phìn-kiûn chui-kô vûn he chhit-ngie̍t fun ke ngiap-sṳ 33.6 thu.

貓熊一般分安到熊貓、大熊貓或者大貓熊，係一種野生嘅哺乳動物。其撈熊同貓仔一樣都係食肉目嘅。雖然講科學家當多將其分至熊科下背去，猶有人試著其毋係熊嘅一種。貓熊嘅身體肥固固，頭圓滾滾仔，尾當短，身體面頂烏撈白兩種顏色分當清楚，身體同尾係白色，耳、目睭、手腳撈肩頭都係烏色嘅，肚底有嘅係棕色，有嘅係烏色。貓熊嘅身體一般有120至180公分該樣長，尾差毋多有10至20公分恁長，膴身大體有60至150公斤恁重。一般來講雄性嘅比雌性嘅大頭一滴仔。貓熊原旦係生活在暗摸摸仔嘅竹林裏肚，故所目睭毋好使，毋過其在暗晡嘅時節一樣遽板。

Hak-kâ-ngî  [Wikipedia](https://hak.wikipedia.org/wiki/Wikipedia "Wikipedia") Chhè-kâ me cho-tet [Phiên-siá](https://hak.wikipedia.org/wiki/Wikipedia:Chh%C3%B3ng-kien_S%C3%AEn_Thi%C3%A0u-muk "Wikipedia:Chhóng-kien Sîn Thiàu-muk")

[Hak-kâ-ngî](https://hak.wikipedia.org/wiki/Hak-k%C3%A2-ng%C3%AE "Hak-kâ-ngî") ke [pán-pún](https://hak.wikipedia.org/wiki/Hak-k%C3%A2-ng%C3%AE_Wikipedia "Hak-kâ-ngî Wikipedia") kîm-ha ki-kîn yû **[10,380](https://hak.wikipedia.org/wiki/%E7%89%B9%E6%AE%8A:%E7%B5%B1%E8%A8%88%E8%B3%87%E8%A8%8A "特殊:統計資訊")** -phiên vùn-chông e. 齊家乜做得[編寫](https://hak.wikipedia.org/wiki/Wikipedia:Chh%C3%B3ng-kien_S%C3%AEn_Thi%C3%A0u-muk "Wikipedia:Chhóng-kien Sîn Thiàu-muk")邇隻語言嘅自由[百科全書](https://hak.wikipedia.org/wiki/Pak-kh%C3%B4-chhi%C3%B2n-s%C3%BB "Pak-khô-chhiòn-sû")。 [客家語](https://hak.wikipedia.org/wiki/%E5%AE%A2%E5%AE%B6%E8%AA%9E "客家語")嘅[版本](https://hak.wikipedia.org/wiki/Hak-k%C3%A2-ng%C3%AE_Wikipedia "Hak-kâ-ngî Wikipedia")今下既經有**[10,380](https://hak.wikipedia.org/wiki/%E7%89%B9%E6%AE%8A:%E7%B5%B1%E8%A8%88%E8%B3%87%E8%A8%8A "特殊:統計資訊")** 篇文章吔。 |  |

![](https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/3/3b/Taiwan_ROC_political_division_map_New_Taipei_City.svg/250px-Taiwan_ROC_political_division_map_New_Taipei_City.svg.png) **[Sîn-pet-sṳ](https://hak.wikipedia.org/wiki/S%C3%AEn-pet-s%E1%B9%B3 "Sîn-pet-sṳ")** he [Thòi-vân](https://hak.wikipedia.org/wiki/Th%C3%B2i-v%C3%A2n "Thòi-vân") pet-phu ke yit-ke sṳ, chhai Thòi-vân tó-song chui pet-tôn, he ngìn-khiéu chui-tô ke hàng-chṳn-khî, fàn-tîn [Thòi-pet-sṳ](https://hak.wikipedia.org/wiki/Th%C3%B2i-pet-s%E1%B9%B3 "Thòi-pet-sṳ"), tûng-pet lìn-sa he [Kî-lùng-sṳ](https://hak.wikipedia.org/wiki/K%C3%AE-l%C3%B9ng-s%E1%B9%B3 "Kî-lùng-sṳ"), tûng-nàm chiap-sông [Ngì-làn-yen](https://hak.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ng%C3%AC-l%C3%A0n-yen "Ngì-làn-yen"), sî-nàm lìn [Thò-yèn-yen](https://hak.wikipedia.org/wiki/Th%C3%B2-y%C3%A8n-yen "Thò-yèn-yen"). Muk-chhièn ngìn-su chhêu-ko 350-van. Pún-sṳ fàn-lau [Thòi-pet-sṳ](https://hak.wikipedia.org/wiki/Th%C3%B2i-pet-s%E1%B9%B3 "Thòi-pet-sṳ") si-chû khi̍p [Kî-lùng-sṳ](https://hak.wikipedia.org/wiki/K%C3%AE-l%C3%B9ng-s%E1%B9%B3 "Kî-lùng-sṳ") sâm-mien, sâm-chá khiung-thùng hìn-sàng [Thòi-pet tû-fi khî](https://hak.wikipedia.org/wiki/Th%C3%B2i-pet_t%C3%BB-fi_kh%C3%AE "Thòi-pet tû-fi khî"), su̍k-yî khiung-thùng sên-fa̍t khiên-é, pin yáng-hióng to lìm-khiun ke [Thò-yèn-yen](https://hak.wikipedia.org/wiki/Th%C3%B2-y%C3%A8n-yen "Thò-yèn-yen") khi̍p [Ngì-làn-yen](https://hak.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ng%C3%AC-l%C3%A0n-yen "Ngì-làn-yen"). Pún-yen su̍k-yî ngie̍t-tai kui-fûng hi-heu khî, chhiòn-ngièn yí-liòng tô yì phìn-kiûn, ngie̍t phìn-kiûn chui-tâi vûn he yit-ngie̍t fun ke ngiap-sṳ 12.4 thu, ngie̍t phìn-kiûn chui-kô vûn he chhit-ngie̍t fun ke ngiap-sṳ 33.6 thu.  
爾做得將滑鼠移動到文字个面頂來顯示其个對應漢字內容。

![](https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/0/0f/Grosser_Panda.JPG/250px-Grosser_Panda.JPG) **[貓熊](https://hak.wikipedia.org/wiki/%E8%B2%93%E7%86%8A "貓熊")** 一般分安到**熊貓** 、**大熊貓** 或者**大貓熊** ，係一種[野生](https://hak.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=%E9%87%8E%E7%94%9F&action=edit&redlink=1 "野生 \(ya̍p-mien hàn-mò chhùn-chhai\)")嘅[哺乳動物](https://hak.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=%E5%93%BA%E4%B9%B3%E5%8B%95%E7%89%A9&action=edit&redlink=1 "哺乳動物 \(ya̍p-mien hàn-mò chhùn-chhai\)")。其撈[熊](https://hak.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=%E7%86%8A&action=edit&redlink=1 "熊 \(ya̍p-mien hàn-mò chhùn-chhai\)")同[貓仔](https://hak.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=%E8%B2%93%E4%BB%94&action=edit&redlink=1 "貓仔 \(ya̍p-mien hàn-mò chhùn-chhai\)")一樣都係[食肉目](https://hak.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=%E9%A3%9F%E8%82%89%E7%9B%AE&action=edit&redlink=1 "食肉目 \(ya̍p-mien hàn-mò chhùn-chhai\)")嘅。雖然講科學家當多將其分至[熊科](https://hak.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=%E7%86%8A%E7%A7%91&action=edit&redlink=1 "熊科 \(ya̍p-mien hàn-mò chhùn-chhai\)")下背去，猶有人試著其毋係熊嘅一種。貓熊嘅身體肥固固，[頭](https://hak.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=%E9%A0%AD&action=edit&redlink=1 "頭 \(ya̍p-mien hàn-mò chhùn-chhai\)")圓滾滾仔，[尾](https://hak.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=%E5%B0%BE&action=edit&redlink=1 "尾 \(ya̍p-mien hàn-mò chhùn-chhai\)")當短，身體面頂烏撈白兩種顏色分當清楚，身體同尾係白色，[耳](https://hak.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=%E8%80%B3&action=edit&redlink=1 "耳 \(ya̍p-mien hàn-mò chhùn-chhai\)")、[目睭](https://hak.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=%E7%9B%AE%E7%9D%AD&action=edit&redlink=1 "目睭 \(ya̍p-mien hàn-mò chhùn-chhai\)")、[手](https://hak.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=%E6%89%8B&action=edit&redlink=1 "手 \(ya̍p-mien hàn-mò chhùn-chhai\)")[腳](https://hak.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=%E8%85%B3&action=edit&redlink=1 "腳 \(ya̍p-mien hàn-mò chhùn-chhai\)")撈[肩頭](https://hak.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=%E8%82%A9%E9%A0%AD&action=edit&redlink=1 "肩頭 \(ya̍p-mien hàn-mò chhùn-chhai\)")都係烏色嘅，[肚底](https://hak.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=%E8%82%9A%E5%BA%95&action=edit&redlink=1 "肚底 \(ya̍p-mien hàn-mò chhùn-chhai\)")有嘅係[棕色](https://hak.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=%E6%A3%95%E8%89%B2&action=edit&redlink=1 "棕色 \(ya̍p-mien hàn-mò chhùn-chhai\)")，有嘅係烏色。貓熊嘅身體一般有120至180[公分](https://hak.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=%E5%85%AC%E5%88%86&action=edit&redlink=1 "公分 \(ya̍p-mien hàn-mò chhùn-chhai\)")該樣長，尾差毋多有10至20公分恁長，膴身大體有60至150[公斤](https://hak.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=%E5%85%AC%E6%96%A4&action=edit&redlink=1 "公斤 \(ya̍p-mien hàn-mò chhùn-chhai\)")恁重。一般來講[雄性](https://hak.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=%E9%9B%84%E6%80%A7&action=edit&redlink=1 "雄性 \(ya̍p-mien hàn-mò chhùn-chhai\)")嘅比[雌性](https://hak.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=%E9%9B%8C%E6%80%A7&action=edit&redlink=1 "雌性 \(ya̍p-mien hàn-mò chhùn-chhai\)")嘅大頭一滴仔。貓熊原旦係生活在暗摸摸仔嘅[竹](https://hak.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=%E7%AB%B9&action=edit&redlink=1 "竹 \(ya̍p-mien hàn-mò chhùn-chhai\)")林裏肚，故所目睭毋好使，毋過其在暗晡嘅時節一樣遽板。
